subject: Tennis
Monte Carlo Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal edged Grigor Dimitrov, 6-2, 2-6, 6-4, to win his 45th straight match at the Monte Carlo Masters and reach the semifinals.
snippet: Rafael Nadal edged Grigor Dimitrov, 6-2, 2-6, 6-4, to win his 45th straight match at the Monte Carlo Masters and reach the semifinals.
